titles: The discovery of vvitches: in answer to severall queries, lately delivered to the judges of the assize for the county of Norfolk. / And now published by Matthevv Hopkins, witch-finder. For the benefit of the whole kingdome.
author: Hopkins, Matthew, d. 1647.
publisher: Printed for R. Royston, at the Angell in Ivie Lane.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
keywords: Witchcraft --  England --  Norfolk --  Early works to 1800.
